variants.text: We're inviting {{company_name}} to participate in our Startup Pitch Contest at the {{event_name}}. This is your chance to pitch your innovation to top-tier investors and industry leaders in the biotech space.
variants.use_case: Direct pitch contest invitation for startups

variants.text: Applications are now open for the Startup Pitch Contest at {{event_name}}. We're looking for innovative biotech and SynBio companies to showcase their solutions to investors and industry experts.
We'd like to invite you to apply for our pitch contest - an opportunity to gain exposure, secure potential funding, and connect with the European biotech ecosystem's key players.
